post.text:

comment.author: Fallon
comment.text: Miley Cyrus went knocking on George Mason University dorm room doors for Hillary! God help us , I guess she's another one of Obama families "role models"

replies.author: Kendra
replies.text: Wonder how many blow jobs she gave out for votes

replies.author: Arial
replies.text: So did Katy Perry--I wonder how many delusional college students voted for Hillary because of celebrity persuasion and being star-struck? Sad...very, very sad. The only positive is if Trump does win, they will all hopefully leave the country as they've promised!

replies.author: Arial
replies.text: Fallon Even if it weren't for all the many other (critical for our freedoms) reasons I'm supporting Trump, just for this alone I'd cast my vote for him and help them all pack their bags!!!

replies.author: Jayme
replies.text: Miley and Beyonc√© was disgusted about Mr Trump s groping- but what kind of role models are they! Hypocrites!
